# Wave Blessing (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Water Spells|water]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 immediate action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Targets:** One Medium or smaller object or creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Stormwrack (WotC), pg. 125

On the seas, there is always the danger of falling overboard, especially to those wearing armor or who simply cannot swim.

The affected targets do not go under the water if they fail a [[Swim (Skill)|Swim]] check for any reason, including being tied up, [[Unconscious|unconscious]], or heavily loaded. However, the targets can still be dragged under by the actions of other creatures.

You can cast this spell with an instant utterance. Casting this spell is an immediate action. You can even cast this spell when it isnâ€™t your turn.

*Wave blessing* counters and dispels *[[Sink (Spell)|sink]].*
